function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of increased contagion in multi-story buildings due to high contact surfaces like elevator buttons and door handles","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases in densely populated high-rise buildings","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of high-contact surfaces, installation of touchless systems in elevators and doors","Technologies":"Touchless systems, UV-C disinfection technology","People":"Residents, visitors, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, construction companies"},{"Description":"Risk of poor indoor air quality leading to sick-building syndrome","Impact":"Health issues for occupants, decreased productivity, increased absenteeism","Mitigation":"Improvement of ventilation, use of natural light, incorporation of plants and natural materials","Technologies":"HVAC systems, skylights, air purifiers","People":"Building occupants, employers, architects","Owner":"Building owners, architects, facility managers"},{"Description":"Risk of overwhelmed healthcare systems and inadequate medical facilities","Impact":"Inadequate treatment for patients, overwhelmed medical staff, increased mortality rates","Mitigation":"Rapid construction of emergency medical facilities, alternative use of existing buildings for healthcare purposes","Technologies":"Rapid construction techniques, modular building designs","People":"Medical staff, patients, healthcare administrators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, construction companies"}]}
